headData.note: machine generated, Please do not manually modify this file!

doc: 对于未编译或[嵌入](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/Program.htm#embedded-scripts)的脚本：实际运行当前脚本的 EXE 文件的完整路径和名称。

对于基于 [.bin 文件](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/Scripts.htm#ahk2exe-base)的[编译脚本](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/Scripts.htm#ahk2exe)，该值是通过从注册表中读取安装目录并附加“\AutoHotkey.exe”来确定的。如果未安装 AutoHotkey,则该值为空。下面的示例是等效的:

[\[v1.1.34+\]](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/AHKL_ChangeLog.htm#v1.1.34.00 "Applies to AutoHotkey v1.1.34 and later")：对于基于.exe文件的编译脚本,A\_AhkPath包含编译脚本的完整路径。这可以与 [/script](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/Scripts.htm#SlashScript) 结合使用以执行外部脚本。若要改为找到已安装的 AutoHotkey 副本，请阅读如上所示的注册表。
在 1.0.22 之前的版本中，此变量为空。否则，它包含运行脚本的 AutoHotkey 版本，例如 1.0.22。对于[已编译的脚本](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/Scripts.htm#ahk2exe),将报告最初用于编译它的版本。版本号的格式允许脚本检查A\_AhkVersion是否大于 > 或 >= 的最小版本号，如以下示例所示
包含当前用户的应用程序特定数据的文件夹的完整路径和名称。例如：
包含所有用户应用程序特定数据的文件夹的完整路径和名称。例如：
包含命令行参数[数组](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/Objects.htm#Usage_Simple_Arrays)。有关详细信息，请参阅将[命令行参数传递给脚本](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/Scripts.htm#cmd)。
[AutoTrim](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/AutoTrim.htm) 设置的当前模式 (`On or Off`)
(A\_NumBatchLines的同义词)[由 SetBatchLines](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/SetBatchLines.htm) 设置的当前值。示例: 200 或 10 毫秒（取决于格式）。
(A\_NumBatchLines的同义词)[由 SetBatchLines](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/SetBatchLines.htm) 设置的当前值。示例: 200 或 10 毫秒（取决于格式）。
- 插入符号的当前 X 和 Y 坐标（文本插入点）。坐标是相对于活动窗口的，除非使用 [CoordMode](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/CoordMode.htm) 使它们相对于整个屏幕。如果没有活动窗口或无法确定插入点位置，则这些变量为空。
- 以下脚本允许您移动插入符号以查看其当前位置，以显示在自动更新工具提示中。请注意，某些窗口(例如某些版本的 MS Word)报告相同的插入符号位置，而不管其实际位置如何。
- 插入符号的当前 X 和 Y 坐标（文本插入点）。坐标是相对于活动窗口的，除非使用 [CoordMode](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/CoordMode.htm) 使它们相对于整个屏幕。如果没有活动窗口或无法确定插入点位置，则这些变量为空。
- 以下脚本允许您移动插入符号以查看其当前位置，以显示在自动更新工具提示中。请注意，某些窗口(例如某些版本的 MS Word)报告相同的插入符号位置，而不管其实际位置如何。
可用于获取或设置操作系统剪贴板的内容。有关详细信息，请参阅[剪贴板](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/misc/Clipboard.htm)。

包含与 ComSpec 环境变量相同的字符串，该变量通常是命令提示符可执行文件 (cmd.exe) 的完整路径。通常与 [Run/RunWait](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/Run.htm) 一起使用。例如： 

For example:        `C:\Windows\system32\cmd.exe`
在网络上看到的计算机的名称。
[SetControlDelay](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/SetControlDelay.htm) 设置的当前延迟（始终为十进制，而不是十六进制）。

[\[v1.1.23+\]](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/AHKL_ChangeLog.htm#v1.1.23.00 "Applies to AutoHotkey v1.1.23 and later"):[CoordMode](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/CoordMode.htm) 设置的当前模式（窗口、客户端或屏幕）。

[\[v1.1.23+\]](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/AHKL_ChangeLog.htm#v1.1.23.00 "Applies to AutoHotkey v1.1.23 and later"):[CoordMode](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/CoordMode.htm) 设置的当前模式（窗口、客户端或屏幕）。

[\[v1.1.23+\]](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/AHKL_ChangeLog.htm#v1.1.23.00 "Applies to AutoHotkey v1.1.23 and later"):[CoordMode](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/CoordMode.htm) 设置的当前模式（窗口、客户端或屏幕）。

[\[v1.1.23+\]](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/AHKL_ChangeLog.htm#v1.1.23.00 "Applies to AutoHotkey v1.1.23 and later"):[CoordMode](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/CoordMode.htm) 设置的当前模式（窗口、客户端或屏幕）。

[\[v1.1.23+\]](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/AHKL_ChangeLog.htm#v1.1.23.00 "Applies to AutoHotkey v1.1.23 and later"):[CoordMode](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/CoordMode.htm) 设置的当前模式（窗口、客户端或屏幕）。

当前显示的鼠标光标类型。它将是以下单词之一:AppStarting、Arrow、Cross、Help、IBeam、Icon、No、Size、SizeAll、SizeNESW、SizeNS、SizeNWSE、SizeWE、UpArrow、Wait、Unknown。与大小类型光标一起使用的首字母缩略词是指南针方向,例如 NESW = NorthEast+SouthWest。手形光标(指向和抓取)被归类为未知。
当前 2 位数的日期 (01-31)。 `A_MDay` 同义於 `A_DD`.
当前 2 位数的日期 (01-31)。 `A_MDay` 同义於 `A_DD`.
当前用户语言中的当前星期几的缩写，例如 `Sun`
当前用户语言中的当前星期几的全名，例如 星期日 `Sunday`
当前线程[的默认 GUI](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/Gui.htm#Default) 的名称或编号。

[ListView 函数](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/ListView.htm#BuiltIn)对其进行操作的 [ListView 控件](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/ListView.htm)的[变量名称](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/Gui.htm#Events)或 [HWND](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/Gui.htm#HwndOutputVar)。如果默认 GUI 缺少 ListView，则此变量为空。
[SetDefaultMouseSpeed](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/SetDefaultMouseSpeed.htm) 设置的当前速度（始终为十进制，而不是十六进制）。

[TreeView 函数](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/TreeView.htm#BuiltIn)对其进行操作的 [TreeView 控件](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/TreeView.htm)的[变量名称](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/Gui.htm#Events)或 [HWND](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/Gui.htm#HwndOutputVar)。如果默认 GUI 缺少 TreeView，则此变量为空。
包含当前用户的桌面文件的文件夹的完整路径和名称。例如：
包含所有用户桌面文件的文件夹的完整路径和名称。例如：
当前模式 (`On or Off`) set by [DetectHiddenText](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/DetectHiddenText.htm).
当前模式 (`On or Off`) set by [DetectHiddenWindows](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/DetectHiddenWindows.htm).
用户按下以触发最近的[非自动替换热字符串](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/Hotstrings.htm)的[结束字符](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/Hotstrings.htm#EndChars)。如果不需要结束字符（由于 \* 选项），则此变量将为空。
包含有关以下事件的其他信息：
- [OnClipboardChange 标签](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/OnClipboardChange.htm#label "Deprecated. New scripts should use OnClipboardChange() instead.")

- [GUI 事件](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/Gui.htm#label)，即 [GuiContextMenu](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/Gui.htm#GuiContextMenu)、[GuiDropFiles](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/Gui.htm#GuiDropFiles)、[ListBox](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/GuiControls.htm#ListBox)、[ListView](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/ListView.htm)、[TreeView](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/TreeView.htm) 和 [StatusBar](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/GuiControls.htm#StatusBar)。如果某个事件没有附加信息，则A\_EventInfo包含 0。

要求终止脚本的最新原因。除非脚本具有 [OnExit](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/OnExit.htm#command "Deprecated. New scripts should use OnExit() instead.") 子例程，并且该子例程当前正在运行或已通过退出尝试至少调用过一次，否则此变量为空。有关详细信息，请参阅 [OnExit](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/OnExit.htm#command "Deprecated. New scripts should use OnExit() instead.")。

[\[v1.0.90+\]](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/AHKL_ChangeLog.htm#L46 "Applies to:AutoHotkey_L Revision 46 and later AutoHotkey v1.0.90.00 and later")：包含各种命令的默认编码;请参阅 [FileEncoding](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/FileEncoding.htm)。
[SetFormat](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/SetFormat.htm "Deprecated. New scripts should use Format() instead.") 设置的当前浮点数格式。

[SetFormat](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/SetFormat.htm "Deprecated. New scripts should use Format() instead.") 设置的当前整数格式（H 或 D）。[\[v1.0.90+\]](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/AHKL_ChangeLog.htm#L42 "Applies to: AutoHotkey_L Revision 42 and later AutoHotkey v1.0.90.00 and later)：这也可能包含小写的 h。
启动[当前线程](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/misc/Threads.htm)的 [GUI](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/Gui.htm) 的名称或编号。除非 Gui 控件、菜单栏项或事件（如 GuiClose/GuiEscape）启动了当前线程，否则此变量为空。
与启动[当前线程](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/misc/Threads.htm)的 GUI 控件关联的变量的名称。
如果该控件缺少[关联的变量](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/Gui.htm#Events)，则A\_GuiControl包含控件的文本/标题的前 63 个字符（这通常用于避免为每个按钮提供变量名称）。A\_GuiControl在任何时候都是空白的：
- 2 GUI 菜单栏项或事件（如 GuiClose/GuiEscape）启动了当前线程;
- 3 控件缺少关联变量，并且没有标题;
- 4 最初启动当前线程的控件不再存在（可能是由于 [Gui Destroy](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/Gui.htm#Destroy)）。
启动[当前线程](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/misc/Threads.htm)的事件类型。如果线程不是通过 [GUI 操作](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/Gui.htm)启动的，则此变量为空。否则，它包含以下字符串之一：
**Normal：**该事件由单击鼠标左键或击键（<kbd>↑</kbd>、<kbd>→</kbd>、<kbd>↓</kbd>、<kbd>←</kbd> <kbd>Tab</kbd> <kbd>Space</kbd> 带下划线的快捷键等）触发。此值还用于菜单栏项和特殊事件，例如 GuiClose 和 GuiEscape。
**DoubleClick：**该事件由双击触发。注意：点击对的第一次点击仍会首先收到_正常_事件。换句话说，子例程将启动两次：一次是第一次点击，另一次是第二次点击。

**Context-sensitive values：**有关详细信息，请参阅 [GuiContextMenu](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/Gui.htm#GuiContextMenu)、[GuiDropFiles](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/Gui.htm#GuiDropFiles)、[Slider](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/GuiControls.htm#Slider)、[MonthCal](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/GuiControls.htm#MonthCal)、[ListView](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/ListView.htm) 和 [TreeView](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/TreeView.htm)。
启动[当前线程](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/misc/Threads.htm)的事件类型。如果线程不是通过 [GUI 操作](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/Gui.htm)启动的，则此变量为空。否则，它包含以下字符串之一：
**Normal：**该事件由单击鼠标左键或击键（<kbd>↑</kbd>、<kbd>→</kbd>、<kbd>↓</kbd>、<kbd>←</kbd> <kbd>Tab</kbd> <kbd>Space</kbd> 带下划线的快捷键等）触发。此值还用于菜单栏项和特殊事件，例如 GuiClose 和 GuiEscape。
**DoubleClick：**该事件由双击触发。注意：点击对的第一次点击仍会首先收到_正常_事件。换句话说，子例程将启动两次：一次是第一次点击，另一次是第二次点击。

**Context-sensitive values：**有关详细信息，请参阅 [GuiContextMenu](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/Gui.htm#GuiContextMenu)、[GuiDropFiles](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/Gui.htm#GuiDropFiles)、[Slider](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/GuiControls.htm#Slider)、[MonthCal](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/GuiControls.htm#MonthCal)、[ListView](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/ListView.htm) 和 [TreeView](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/TreeView.htm)。

它们包含在 [GuiSize 子例程](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/Gui.htm#GuiSize)中引用时 GUI 窗口的宽度和高度。它们适用于窗口的工作区，即不包括标题栏、菜单栏和边框的区域。[\[v1.1.11+\]](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/AHKL_ChangeLog.htm#v1.1.11.00 "Applies to AutoHotkey v1.1.11 and later")：这些值受 [DPI 缩放](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/Gui.htm#DPIScale)的影响。

它们包含在 [GuiSize 子例程](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/Gui.htm#GuiSize)中引用时 GUI 窗口的宽度和高度。它们适用于窗口的工作区，即不包括标题栏、菜单栏和边框的区域。[\[v1.1.11+\]](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/AHKL_ChangeLog.htm#v1.1.11.00 "Applies to AutoHotkey v1.1.11 and later")：这些值受 [DPI 缩放](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/Gui.htm#DPIScale)的影响。

它们包含 [GuiContextMenu](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/Gui.htm#GuiContextMenu) 和 [GuiDropFiles](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/Gui.htm#GuiDropFiles) 事件的 X 和 Y 坐标。坐标相对于窗口的左上角。[\[v1.1.11+\]](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/AHKL_ChangeLog.htm#v1.1.11.00 "Applies to AutoHotkey v1.1.11 and later")：这些值受 [DPI 缩放](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/Gui.htm#DPIScale)的影响。

它们包含 [GuiContextMenu](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/Gui.htm#GuiContextMenu) 和 [GuiDropFiles](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/Gui.htm#GuiDropFiles) 事件的 X 和 Y 坐标。坐标相对于窗口的左上角。[\[v1.1.11+\]](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/AHKL_ChangeLog.htm#v1.1.11.00 "Applies to AutoHotkey v1.1.11 and later")：这些值受 [DPI 缩放](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/Gui.htm#DPIScale)的影响。
24 小时制中的当前 2 位小时 （00-23）（例如，17 是下午 5 点）。要检索 12 小时时间以及 AM/PM 指示器，请执行以下示例：
计算机中前 4 个网络适配器的 IP 地址。
计算机中前 4 个网络适配器的 IP 地址。
计算机中前 4 个网络适配器的 IP 地址。
计算机中前 4 个网络适配器的 IP 地址。
除非已通过以下方式指定了自定义[托盘图标](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/Program.htm#tray-icon)，否则为空白 - 在这种情况下，它是图标文件的完整路径和名称。
Menu, tray, icon ;-- in which case it's the full path and name of the icon's file.

如果[托盘图标](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/Program.htm#tray-icon)当前处于隐藏状态，则包含 1，否则为 0。可以通过 [#NoTrayIcon](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/_NoTrayIcon.htm) 或[菜单](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/Menu.htm)命令隐藏该图标。
如果A\_IconFile为空，则为空。否则，它是A\_IconFile图标的编号（通常为 1）。
除非已通过以下方式指定[了托盘图标](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/Program.htm#tray-icon)的自定义工具提示，否则为空白 - 在这种情况下，它是提示的文本。
Menu, Tray, Tip ; 在这种情况下，它是提示的文本。
这是当前循环迭代的编号（64 位整数）。它包含 1 第一次执行循环的主体。第二次，它包含 2;等等。如果内部环路被外部环路包围，则内部环路优先。A\_Index[在所有类型的循环](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/Language.htm#loop-statement)中工作，但在循环之外包含 0。
[\[v1.1.08+\]](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/AHKL_ChangeLog.htm#v1.1.08.00 "Applies to AutoHotkey v1.1.08 and later")：如果操作系统是 64 位，则包含 1 （true），如果操作系统是 32 位，则包含 0 （false）。
If the current user has admin rights, this variable contains `1`. Otherwise, it contains `0`.

- To have the script restart itself as admin (or show a prompt to the user requesting admin), use [Run \*RunAs](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/Run.htm#RunAs). However, note that running the script as admin causes all programs launched by the script to also run as admin. For a possible alternative, see [the FAQ](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/FAQ.htm#uac).
如果当前用户具有管理员权限，则包含 1，否则为 0。

若要让脚本以 admin 身份重启脚本（或向请求 admin 的用户显示提示），请使用[运行 \*RunAs](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/Run.htm#RunAs)。但是，请注意，以 admin 身份运行脚本会导致脚本启动的所有程序也以 admin 身份运行。有关可能的替代方法，请参阅[常见问题解答](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/FAQ.htm#uac)。

如果 [Critical](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/Critical.htm) 对于 [当前线程](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/misc/Threads.htm) 关闭，则包含 0。否则它包含一个大于零的整数，即 Critical 正在使用的 [消息检查频率](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/Critical.htm#Interval)。由于
; 关闭关键状态后，可以通过以下方式保存和恢复当前的关键状态：

Contains 1 if the [thread](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/misc/Threads.htm) immediately underneath the current thread is [paused](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/Pause.htm). Otherwise it contains 0.
Contains 1 if the script is [suspended](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/Suspend.htm) and 0 otherwise.

Contains 1 if strings are Unicode (16-bit) and an empty string (which is considered [false](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/Variables.htm#Boolean)) if strings are ANSI (8-bit). The format of strings depends on the version of AutoHotkey.exe which is used to run the script, or if it is compiled, which bin file was used to compile it.

For ANSI executables prior to [[v1.1.06]](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/AHKL_ChangeLog.htm#v1.1.06.00), A_IsUnicode was left undefined; that is, the script could assign to it, and attempting to read it could trigger a [UseUnsetGlobal warning](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/_Warn.htm). In later versions it is always defined and is read-only.

The current delay or duration set by [SetKeyDelay](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/SetKeyDelay.htm) (always decimal, not hex). A_KeyDuration requires [[v1.1.23+]](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/AHKL_ChangeLog.htm#v1.1.23.00 "Applies to AutoHotkey v1.1.23 and later").

The current delay or duration set by [SetKeyDelay](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/SetKeyDelay.htm) for the [SendPlay](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/Send.htm#SendPlayDetail) mode (always decimal, not hex). Requires [[v1.1.23+]](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/AHKL_ChangeLog.htm#v1.1.23.00 "Applies to AutoHotkey v1.1.23 and later").

The current delay or duration set by [SetKeyDelay](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/SetKeyDelay.htm) (always decimal, not hex). A_KeyDuration requires [[v1.1.23+]](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/AHKL_ChangeLog.htm#v1.1.23.00 "Applies to AutoHotkey v1.1.23 and later").

The current delay or duration set by [SetKeyDelay](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/SetKeyDelay.htm) for the [SendPlay](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/Send.htm#SendPlayDetail) mode (always decimal, not hex). Requires [[v1.1.23+]](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/AHKL_ChangeLog.htm#v1.1.23.00 "Applies to AutoHotkey v1.1.23 and later").
The system's default language, which is one of [these 4-digit codes](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/misc/Languages.htm).
the_language := languageCode_%A_Language%  ; Get the name of the system's default language.

The result from the OS's GetLastError() function or the last COM object invocation. For details, see [DllCall()](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/DllCall.htm#LastError) and [Run/RunWait](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/Run.htm#LastError).

The full path and name of the file to which [A_LineNumber](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/Variables.htm#LineNumber) belongs. If the script was loaded from an external file, this is the same as [A_ScriptFullPath](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/Variables.htm#ScriptFullPath) unless the line belongs to one of the script's [#Include files](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/_Include.htm).

- If the script was [compiled](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/Scripts.htm#ahk2exe) based on a [.bin file](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/Scripts.htm#ahk2exe-base), this is the full path and name of the current executable file, the same as [A_ScriptFullPath](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/Variables.htm#ScriptFullPath).

- [[v1.1.34+]:](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/AHKL_ChangeLog.htm#v1.1.34.00 "Applies to AutoHotkey v1.1.34 and later") If the script is [embedded](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/Program.htm#embedded-scripts), A_LineFile contains an asterisk (\*) followed by the resource name; e.g. \*#1

The number of the currently executing line within the script (or one of its [#Include files](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/_Include.htm)). This line number will match the one shown by [ListLines](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/ListLines.htm); it can be useful for error reporting such as this example:
MsgBox % "Could not write to log file, line number :" A_LineNumber

- Since a [compiled script](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/Scripts.htm#ahk2exe) has merged all its [#Include files](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/_Include.htm) into one big script, its line numbering may be different than when it is run in non-compiled mode.
Contains 1 if [ListLines](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/ListLines.htm) is enabled. Otherwise it contains 0.

The built-in variable **A_LoopField** exists within any parsing loop. It contains the contents of the current substring (field) from _InputVar_. If an inner parsing loop is enclosed by an outer parsing loop, the innermost loop's field will take precedence.
The attributes of the file currently retrieved.

The path of the directory in which A_LoopFileName resides. If FilePattern contains a relative path rather than an absolute path, the path here will also be relative. A root directory will not contain a trailing backslash. For example: C:
The file's extension (e.g. TXT, DOC, or EXE). The period (.) is not included.

The path and name of the file/folder currently retrieved. If FilePattern contains a relative path rather than an absolute path, the path here will also be relative. In addition, any short (8.3) folder names in FilePattern will still be short (see next item to get the long version).        
A_LoopFilePath is available in [v1.1.28+] as an alias of A_LoopFileFullPath, which is a misnomer.

This is different than A_LoopFileFullPath in the following ways: 1) It always contains the absolute/complete path of the file even if FilePattern contains a relative path; 2) Any short (8.3) folder names in FilePattern itself are converted to their long names; 3) Characters in FilePattern are converted to uppercase or lowercase to match the case stored in the file system. This is useful for converting file names -- such as those passed into a script as command line parameters -- to their exact path names as shown by Explorer.
The name of the file or folder currently retrieved (without the path).

The path and name of the file/folder currently retrieved. If FilePattern contains a relative path rather than an absolute path, the path here will also be relative. In addition, any short (8.3) folder names in FilePattern will still be short (see next item to get the long version).        
A_LoopFilePath is available in [v1.1.28+] as an alias of A_LoopFileFullPath, which is a misnomer.

The 8.3 short name, or alternate name of the file. If the file doesn't have one (due to the long name being shorter than 8.3 or perhaps because short-name generation is disabled on an NTFS file system), A_LoopFileName will be retrieved instead.

The 8.3 short path and name of the file/folder currently retrieved. For example: C:\MYDOCU~1\ADDRES~1.txt. If FilePattern contains a relative path rather than an absolute path, the path here will also be relative.         
To retrieve the complete 8.3 path and name for a single file or folder, specify its name for FilePattern as in this example:         Loop, C:\My Documents\Address List.txt ShortPathName := A_LoopFileShortPath        
Note: This variable will be blank if the file does not have a short name, which can happen on systems where NtfsDisable8dot3NameCreation has been set in the registry. It will also be blank if FilePattern contains a relative path and the body of the loop uses SetWorkingDir to switch away from the working directory in effect for the loop itself.
The size in bytes of the file currently retrieved. Files larger than 4 gigabytes are also supported.
The size in Kbytes of the file currently retrieved, rounded down to the nearest integer.
The size in Mbytes of the file currently retrieved, rounded down to the nearest integer.
The time the file was last accessed. Format YYYYMMDDHH24MISS.
The time the file was created. Format YYYYMMDDHH24MISS.
The time the file was last modified. Format YYYYMMDDHH24MISS.

The built-in variable **A_LoopReadLine** exists within any file-reading loop. It contains the contents of the current line excluding the carriage return and linefeed (`r`n) that marks the end of the line. If an inner file-reading loop is enclosed by an outer file-reading loop, the innermost loop's file-line will take precedence.

The name of the root key being accessed (HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE, HKEY_USERS, HKEY_CURRENT_USER, HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT, or HKEY_CURRENT_CONFIG). For remote registry access, this value will not include the computer name.

Name of the currently retrieved item, which can be either a value name or the name of a subkey. Value names displayed by Windows RegEdit as "(Default)" will be retrieved if a value has been assigned to them, but A_LoopRegName will be blank for them.

Name of the current subkey. This will be the same as the Key parameter unless the Recurse        parameter is being used to recursively explore other subkeys. In that case, it will be the full path of the currently retrieved item, not including the root key. For example: Software\SomeApplication\My SubKey

The time the current subkey or any of its values was last modified. Format YYYYMMDDHH24MISS. This variable will be empty if the currently retrieved item is not a subkey (i.e. A_LoopRegType is not the word KEY).

The type of the currently retrieved item, which is one of the following words: KEY (i.e. the currently retrieved item is a subkey not a value), REG_SZ, REG_EXPAND_SZ, REG_MULTI_SZ, REG_DWORD, REG_QWORD, REG_BINARY, REG_LINK, REG_RESOURCE_LIST, REG_FULL_RESOURCE_DESCRIPTOR, REG_RESOURCE_REQUIREMENTS_LIST, REG_DWORD_BIG_ENDIAN (probably rare on most Windows hardware). It will be empty if the currently retrieved item is of an unknown type.
Current month's abbreviation in the current user's language, e.g. `Jul`
Current month's full name in the current user's language, e.g. `July`
Current 3-digit millisecond (000-999). To remove the leading zeros, follow this example:

The current delay set by [SetMouseDelay](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/SetMouseDelay.htm) (always decimal, not hex). A_MouseDelay is for the traditional SendEvent mode, whereas A_MouseDelayPlay is for [SendPlay](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/Send.htm#SendPlayDetail). A_MouseDelayPlay requires [[v1.1.23+]](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/AHKL_ChangeLog.htm#v1.1.23.00 "Applies to AutoHotkey v1.1.23 and later").

The current delay set by [SetMouseDelay](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/SetMouseDelay.htm) (always decimal, not hex). A_MouseDelay is for the traditional SendEvent mode, whereas A_MouseDelayPlay is for [SendPlay](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/Send.htm#SendPlayDetail). A_MouseDelayPlay requires [[v1.1.23+]](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/AHKL_ChangeLog.htm#v1.1.23.00 "Applies to AutoHotkey v1.1.23 and later").

The full path and name of the current user's "My Documents" folder. Unlike most of the similar variables, if the folder is the root of a drive, the final backslash is not included (e.g. it would contain `M:` rather than `M:\`). For example:
The current local time in [YYYYMMDDHH24MISS](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/FileSetTime.htm#YYYYMMDD) format.

**Note**: Date and time math can be performed with [EnvAdd](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/EnvAdd.htm) and [EnvSub](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/EnvSub.htm). Also, [FormatTime](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/FormatTime.htm) can format the date and/or time according to your locale or preferences.
The current Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) in [YYYYMMDDHH24MISS](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/FileSetTime.htm#YYYYMMDD) format. UTC is essentially the same as Greenwich Mean Time (GMT).

The type of operating system being run. Since AutoHotkey 1.1 only supports NT-based operating systems, this is always WIN32_NT. Older versions of AutoHotkey return WIN32_WINDOWS when run on Windows 95/98/ME.
One of the following strings, if appropriate: WIN_7 [[requires v1.0.90+]](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/AHKL_ChangeLog.htm#L42 "Applies to:

AutoHotkey v1.0.90.00 and later"), WIN_8 [[requires v1.1.08+]](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/AHKL_ChangeLog.htm#v1.1.08.00 "Applies to AutoHotkey v1.1.08 and later"), WIN_8.1 [[requires v1.1.15+]](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/AHKL_ChangeLog.htm#v1.1.15.00 "Applies to AutoHotkey v1.1.15 and later"), WIN_VISTA, WIN_2003, WIN_XP, WIN_2000.
Applying compatibility settings in the AutoHotkey executable or compiled script's properties causes the OS to report a different version number, which is reflected by A_OSVersion.

[[v1.1.20+]:](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/AHKL_ChangeLog.htm#v1.1.20.00 "Applies to AutoHotkey v1.1.20 and later") If the OS version is not recognized as one of those listed above, a string in the format "major.minor.build" is returned. For example, `10.0.14393` is Windows 10 build 14393, also known as version 1607.
; This example is obsolete as these operating systems are no longer supported.
if A_OSVersion in WIN_NT4,WIN_95,WIN_98,WIN_ME  ; Note: No spaces around commas.
MsgBox % "This script requires Windows 2000/XP or later."
Same as above except for the previous hotkey. It will be blank if none.

[[v1.1.01+]:](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/AHKL_ChangeLog.htm#v1.1.01.00 "Applies to AutoHotkey v1.1.01 and later") The name of the last key which was pressed prior to the most recent key-press or key-release, or blank if no applicable key-press can be found in the key history. All input generated by AutoHotkey scripts is excluded. For this variable to be of use, the [keyboard](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/_InstallKeybdHook.htm) or [mouse hook](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/_InstallMouseHook.htm) must be installed and [key history](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/KeyHistory.htm) must be enabled.

The Program Files directory (e.g. `C:\Program Files` or `C:\Program Files (x86)`). This is usually the same as the _ProgramFiles_ [environment variable](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/Concepts.htm#environment-variables).
- On [64-bit systems](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/Variables.htm#Is64bitOS) (and not 32-bit systems), the following applies:
> - If the executable (EXE) that is running the script is 32-bit, A_ProgramFiles returns the path of the "Program Files (x86)" directory.
> - For 32-bit processes, the _ProgramW6432_ environment variable contains the path of the 64-bit Program Files directory. On Windows 7 and later, it is also set for 64-bit processes.
> - The _ProgramFiles(x86)_ environment variable contains the path of the 32-bit Program Files directory.

- [[v1.0.43.08+]](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/ChangeLogHelp.htm#Older_Changes "Applies to AutoHotkey v1.0.43.08 and later"): The A_prefix may be omitted, which helps ease the transition to [#NoEnv](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/_NoEnv.htm).
The full path and name of the Programs folder in the current user's Start Menu. For example:
The full path and name of the Programs folder in the all-users Start Menu. For example:

[[v1.0.90+]:](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/AHKL_ChangeLog.htm#L42 " Applies to:AutoHotkey_L Revision 42 and later AutoHotkey v1.0.90.00 and later") Contains the size of a pointer, in bytes. This is either 4 (32-bit) or 8 (64-bit), depending on what type of executable (EXE) is running the script.

[[v1.1.08+]:](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/AHKL_ChangeLog.htm#v1.1.08.00 "Applies to AutoHotkey v1.1.08 and later") The current registry view as set by [SetRegView](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/SetRegView.htm).

Number of pixels per logical inch along the screen width. In a system with multiple display monitors, this value is the same for all monitors. On most systems this is 96; it depends on the system's text size (DPI) setting. See also [Gui -DPIScale](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/Gui.htm#DPIScale).
The width and height of the primary monitor, in pixels (e.g. 1024 and 768).
To discover the dimensions of other monitors in a multi-monitor system, use [SysGet](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/SysGet.htm).
To instead discover the width and height of the entire desktop (even if it spans multiple monitors), use the following example:

In addition, use [SysGet](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/SysGet.htm) to discover the work area of a monitor, which can be smaller than the monitor's total area because the taskbar and other registered desktop toolbars are excluded.
The width and height of the primary monitor, in pixels (e.g. 1024 and 768).
To discover the dimensions of other monitors in a multi-monitor system, use [SysGet](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/SysGet.htm).
To instead discover the width and height of the entire desktop (even if it spans multiple monitors), use the following example:

In addition, use [SysGet](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/SysGet.htm) to discover the work area of a monitor, which can be smaller than the monitor's total area because the taskbar and other registered desktop toolbars are excluded.
The full path of the directory where the current script is located. The final backslash is omitted (even for root directories).
The full path of the current script, e.g. `C:\Scripts\My Script.ahk`

- If the script is [compiled](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/Scripts.htm#ahk2exe) or [embedded](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/Program.htm#embedded-scripts), this is the full path of the current executable file.
The unique ID (HWND/handle) of the script's hidden [main window](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/Program.htm#main-window).
The file name of the current script, without its path, e.g. `MyScript.ahk`

- If the script is [compiled](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/Scripts.htm#ahk2exe) or [embedded](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/Program.htm#embedded-scripts), this is the name of the current executable file.

[[v1.1.23+]:](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/AHKL_ChangeLog.htm#v1.1.23.00 "Applies to AutoHotkey v1.1.23 and later") The current [SendLevel](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/SendLevel.htm) setting (an integer between 0 and 100, inclusive).

[[v1.1.23+]:](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/AHKL_ChangeLog.htm#v1.1.23.00 "Applies to AutoHotkey v1.1.23 and later") The current mode (Event, Input, Play or InputThenPlay) set by [SendMode](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/SendMode.htm).
This variable contains a single space character. See [AutoTrim](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/AutoTrim.htm) for details.
The full path and name of the current user's Start Menu folder. For example:
The full path and name of the all-users Start Menu folder. For example:
The full path and name of the Startup folder in the current user's Start Menu. For example:
The full path and name of the Startup folder in the all-users Start Menu. For example:

[[v1.1.23+]:](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/AHKL_ChangeLog.htm#v1.1.23.00 "Applies to AutoHotkey v1.1.23 and later") The current mode (On or Off) set by [SetStoreCapsLockMode](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/SetStoreCapslockMode.htm).
The current mode (`On, Off, or Locale`) set by [StringCaseSense](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/StringCaseSense.htm).
This variable contains a single tab character. See [AutoTrim](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/AutoTrim.htm) for details.

The full path and name of the folder designated to hold temporary files. It is retrieved from one of the following locations (in order): 1) the [environment variables](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/Concepts.htm#environment-variables) TMP, TEMP, or USERPROFILE; 2) the Windows directory.

The name of the [user-defined function](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/Functions.htm) that is currently executing (blank if none); for example: MyFunction. See also: [IsFunc()](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/IsFunc.htm)

The most recently executed [hotkey](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/Hotkeys.htm) or [non-auto-replace hotstring](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/Hotstrings.htm) (blank if none), e.g. #z. This value will change if the [current thread](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/misc/Threads.htm) is interrupted by another hotkey, so be sure to copy it into another variable immediately if you need the original value for later use in a subroutine.

- When a hotkey is first created -- either by the [Hotkey command](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/Hotkey.htm) or a [double-colon label](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/Hotkeys.htm) in the script -- its key name and the ordering of its modifier symbols becomes the permanent name of that hotkey, shared by all [variants](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/_IfWinActive.htm#variant) of the hotkey.
- When a hotstring is first created, the exact text used to create it becomes the permanent name of the hotstring.

The name of the [label](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/misc/Labels.htm) (subroutine) that is currently executing (blank if none); for example: MyLabel. It is updated whenever the script executes [Gosub](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/Gosub.htm)/[Return](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/Return.htm) or [Goto](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/Goto.htm). It is also updated for automatically-called labels such as [timers](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/SetTimer.htm), [GUI threads](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/Gui.htm#DefaultWin), [menu items](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/Menu.htm), [hotkeys](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/Hotkeys.htm), [hotstrings](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/Hotstrings.htm), [OnClipboardChange labels](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/OnClipboardChange.htm#label "Deprecated. New scripts should use OnClipboardChange() instead."), and [OnExit labels](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/OnExit.htm#command "Deprecated. New scripts should use OnExit() instead."). However, A_ThisLabel is not updated when execution "falls into" a label from above; when that happens, A_ThisLabel retains its previous value. See also: [A_ThisHotkey](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/Variables.htm#ThisHotkey) and [IsLabel()](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/IsLabel.htm)
The name of the menu from which A_ThisMenuItem was selected.
The name of the most recently selected [custom menu item](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/Menu.htm) (blank if none).

A number indicating the current position of A_ThisMenuItem within A_ThisMenu. The first item in the menu is 1, the second is 2, and so on. Menu separator lines are counted. This variable is blank if A_ThisMenuItem is blank or no longer exists within A_ThisMenu. It is also blank if A_ThisMenu itself no longer exists.

The number of milliseconds that have elapsed since the system was started, up to 49.7 days. By storing A_TickCount in a variable, elapsed time can later be measured by subtracting that variable from the latest A_TickCount value. For example:
If you need more precision than A_TickCount's 10ms, use [QueryPerformanceCounter()](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/DllCall.htm#QPC).

The number of milliseconds that have elapsed since the system last received keyboard, mouse, or other input. This is useful for determining whether the user is away. Physical input from the user as well as artificial input generated by **any** program or script (such as the [Send](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/Send.htm) or [MouseMove](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/MouseMove.htm) commands) will reset this value back to zero. Since this value tends to increase by increments of 10, do not check whether it is equal to another value. Instead, check whether it is greater or less than another value. For example:
MsgBox, % "The last keyboard or mouse activity was at least 10 minutes ago."

If the [keyboard hook](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/_InstallKeybdHook.htm) is installed, this is the number of milliseconds that have elapsed since the system last received physical keyboard input. Otherwise, this variable is equivalent to A_TimeIdle.

If the [mouse hook](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/_InstallMouseHook.htm) is installed, this is the number of milliseconds that have elapsed since the system last received physical mouse input. Otherwise, this variable is equivalent to A_TimeIdle.

Similar to above but ignores artificial keystrokes and/or mouse clicks whenever the corresponding hook ([keyboard](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/_InstallKeybdHook.htm) or [mouse](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/_InstallMouseHook.htm)) is installed; that is, it responds only to physical events. (This prevents simulated keystrokes and mouse clicks from falsely indicating that a user is present.) If neither hook is installed, this variable is equivalent to A_TimeIdle. If only one hook is installed, only its type of physical input affects A_TimeIdlePhysical (the other/non-installed hook's input, both physical and artificial, has no effect).
The number of milliseconds that have elapsed since A_PriorHotkey was pressed. It will be -1 whenever A_PriorHotkey is blank.
The number of milliseconds that have elapsed since A_ThisHotkey was pressed. It will be -1 whenever A_ThisHotkey is blank.
The current mode set by [SetTitleMatchMode](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/SetTitleMatchMode.htm): `1, 2, 3, or RegEx`
The current match speed (fast or slow) set by [SetTitleMatchMode](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/SetTitleMatchMode.htm).
The logon name of the user who launched this script.
Current 1-digit day of the week (1-7). 1 is Sunday in all locales.
The current delay set by [SetWinDelay](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/SetWinDelay.htm) (always decimal, not hex).

The script's current working directory, which is where files will be accessed by default. The final backslash is not included unless it is the root directory. Two examples: C:\ and C:\My Documents. Use [SetWorkingDir](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/SetWorkingDir.htm) to change the working directory.

The script's initial working directory, which is determined by how it was launched. For example, if it was run via shortcut -- such as on the Start Menu -- its initial working directory is determined by the "Start in" field within the shortcut's properties.
Current day of the year (1-366). The value is not zero-padded, e.g. 9 is retrieved, not 009. To retrieve a zero-padded value, use the following:
Current year and week number (e.g. 200453) according to ISO 8601. To separate the year from the week, use

Precise definition of A_YWeek: If the week containing January 1st has four or more days in the new year, it is considered week 1. Otherwise, it is the last week of the previous year, and the next week is week 1.
**Note**: To retrieve a formatted time or date appropriate for your locale and language, use
**Note**: To retrieve a formatted time or date appropriate for your locale and language, use
